mapper.select: SELECT ARM.EMP_CODE ,ARM.ATTD_REST_SEQ ,ARM.ATTD_REST_CODE ,ARM.REQUEST_DATE ,ARM.START_DATE ,ARM.END_DATE ,ARM.DAYS ,ARM.COST ,ARM.CAUSE ,ARM.APPROVAL_STATUS ,E.EMP_NAME ,ARM.OTHER_SUDANG FROM ATTD_REST_MGT ARM, EMPLOYEE E WHERE ARM.EMP_CODE=#{empCode} AND ARM.EMP_CODE=E.EMP_CODE ORDER BY ATTD_REST_SEQ, LENGTH(APPROVAL_STATUS) DESC, END_DATE
mapper.insert:
SELECT ATTD_REST_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ATTD_REST_MGT ( EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, ATTD_REST_SEQ, ATTD_REST_CODE, REQUEST_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, DAYS, COST, CAUSE, APPROVAL_STATUS, OTHER_SUDANG ) VALUES( #{empCode}, #{empName}, #{attdRestSeq}, #{attdRestCode}, #{requestDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{days}, #{cost}, #{cause}, #{approvalStatus}, #{otherSudang} )
mapper.select: SELECT arm.*,e.* FROM ATTD_REST_MGT arm,EMPLOYEE e WHERE arm.REQUEST_DATE=#{basicDay} AND arm.APPROVAL_STATUS='N' AND arm.EMP_CODE=e.EMP_CODE ORDER BY LENGTH(APPROVAL_STATUS) DESC,REQUEST_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTD_REST_MGT SET ATTD_REST_CODE = #{attdRestCode}, REQUEST_DATE = #{requestDate}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, DAYS = #{days}, COST = #{cost}, CAUSE = #{cause}, APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus}, OTHER_SUDANG=#{otherSudang} WHERE ATTD_REST_SEQ = #{attdRestSeq} AND EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTD_REST_MGT WHERE ATTD_REST_SEQ = #{attdRestSeq} AND EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
